Information: Methane stationary fuel combustion emission factor, entered as tonne of :math:`\text{CH}_4` are emitted per TJ of energy demanded
Notes: See Table 2.2 in V2, C2 (energy industry default stationary combustion emission factors) of IPCC GNGHGI for stationary combustion :math:`\text{CH}_4` emission factors.

Information: Carbon Dioxide fuel combustion emission factor, enetered as tonne of :math:`\text{CO}_2` are emitted per TJ of energy demanded
Notes: See Table 2.2 in V2, C2 (energy industry default stationary combustion emission factors) and Table 3.2.1 in V2, C3 (road transport default mobile combustion emission factors) of IPCC GNGHGI. The two are interchangeable for most fuels. Therefore, the **MODELNAME** model treats stationary and mobile :math:`\text{CO}_2` emission factors as the same.

Information: Nitrous oxide stationary fuel combustion emission factor, entered as tonne of :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` are emitted per TJ of energy demanded
Notes: See Table 2.2 in V2, C2 (energy industry default stationary combustion emission factors) of of IPCC GNGHGI for stationary combustion :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}`) emission factors.

Variable: Energy Demand by Fuel in Industrial Energy
Information: Calculated in **Industrial Energy** subsector. Total energy demand, by fuel, in industrial energy.

Variable: Energy Demand by Fuel in Transportation
Information: Calculated in **Transportation** subsector. Total energy demand, by fuel, in transportation.

Variable: Energy Demand by Fuel in SCOE
Information: Calculated in **Stationary Combustion and Other Emissions** subsector. Total energy demand, by fuel, in industrial energy.

Variable: Energy Demand by Fuel in CCSQ
Information: Calculated in **Carbon Capture and Sequestration** subsector. Total energy demand, by fuel, in industrial energy.

Variable: Energy Demand by Fuel in Electricity
Information: Calculated in **Electricity** subsector. Total energy demand, by fuel, in industrial energy.
Total demand for fuels across all energy subsectors.
